ENTRY.refkeywords: show report status state information results convolved source model

DESC.PARA:
The show_model command displays the convolved source model. To obtain the unconvolved model information, use the command show_source
("ahelp show_source").

LIST.ITEM: id - the id of the dataset to use; default is to show model information for all available datasets.
outfile - name of the file in which to store the information

DESC.PARA: The behavior of the screen output is determined by the user's $PAGER environment variable setting, which is usually a variant of "more." To disable paging within show_all() - i.e. print the entire contents, even if it scrolls offscreen - change this setting to "cat" before starting Sherpa:
DESC.VERBATIM:
unix% setenv PAGER cat
unix% sherpa

DESC.PARA: Print the model information for all datasets to the screen.
Write the model information for dataset id=2 to the file "sherpa.model", clobbering any existing file with the same name.
